title: Nikobitcoins
author: Nikobitcoins
content: I'll provide up to 200,000 telegram members to your telegram channel without getting flagged.Real membersPrice ~ $20 each 50kMy Telegram ~ Nikobitcoins1WhatsApp.     ~ +12568010703.

comments.author: shanz
comments.body: Fake members are harmful for Telegram. However, if you put your client's link in your channel and promote it in a natural way, it would be better.

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Quote from: Nikobitcoins on February 26, 2023, 12:01:08 AMI'll provide up to 200,000 telegram members to your telegram channel without getting flagged.Real membersPrice ~ $20 each 50kMy Telegram ~ Nikobitcoins1WhatsApp.     ~ +12568010703.Is this not more of a bot invasion? Are you a celebrity to gather such large number of followership? Come to talk of it looking at the price fixed one would think this is account holder seems not serious. You claim to be able to provide such number of members to a telegram community, how possible is that? Show proof that you have done that before. If you can drop a WhatsApp number here for chat then you can as well drop your social media handle with which you depend on to get that huge number of people to being a member of telegram community. I will advise anyone dealing should deal with caution and also seek the service of an escrow so as to prevent issues while dealing.

comments.author: Daltonik
comments.body: Quote from: Nikobitcoins on February 26, 2023, 12:01:08 AMI'll provide up to 200,000 telegram members to your telegram channel without getting flagged.Real membersPrice ~ $20 each 50kMy Telegram ~ Nikobitcoins1WhatsApp.     ~ +12568010703.Well, in fact, it would be necessary to clarify what is really meant, I doubt that these are real telegram subscribers, if we are talking about bots, then it was necessary to specify, but why use an intermediary if anyone can buy bots on the trading floor for a much lower price, for example here https://lowcostsmm.com/buy-telegram-bots-cheap/#2

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: Quote from: Daltonik on March 04, 2023, 07:50:00 AMWell, in fact, it would be necessary to clarify what is really meant, I doubt that these are real telegram subscribers, if we are talking about bots, then it was necessary to specify, but why use an intermediary if anyone can buy bots on the trading floor for a much lower price, for example here https://lowcostsmm.com/buy-telegram-bots-cheap/#2Views and members not the same. Looks cheap. But also worthless.Just wondering if you can add 200000 members. Can't you add 1 million. Would sound better. 200k so small

comments.author: albon
comments.body: Quote from: JanEmil on March 04, 2023, 08:04:45 AMViews and members not the same. Looks cheap. But also worthless.Just wondering if you can add 200000 members. Can't you add 1 million. Would sound better. 200k so small Even if you add a million or 100 million members to your channel or group in Telegram, your channel will have a lot of members in a short time; after the days and weeks pass, you will find the channel reduced from the millions of members that were provided to the number of the actual channel before that, so If they are not real users interested in the content and filed of your channel or group, you will buy a bot service that is not even worth a few cents.I am not here to be against the OP or hinder him from earning a living, but I am saying my opinion quite frankly because I lost a lot of money on these services that have no benefit.
